actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to provide that State domestic relations or community property laws are not preempted by the Act.

summary.text: Amends the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to stipulate that nothing in such Act is intended to prohibit the characterization or treatment under State law of annuities provided by such Act as community property or as property subject to equitable distribution for the purpose of divorce, annulment, or legal separation.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to provide that State domestic relations or community property laws are not preempted by the Act.
